arm_group.description: Treatment with RXI-109 on one side of revised scar and a placebo comparator on the other side.  Treatment to begin either immediately or 2 weeks following the scar revision surgery.
Treatment with RXI-109 on one side of revised scar and a placebo comparator on the other side.  Treatment to begin either immediately or 2 weeks following the scar revision surgery.

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of RXI-109 in reducing the
      recurrence of hypertrophic scar formation following elective revision of a pre-existing
      hypertrophic abdominal scar.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Safety of RXI 109 on the Outcome of Scar Revision Surgery in Healthy Adults

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Adults, 21-55 years of age in general good health

          -  Previous partial hysterectomy, Cesarean section or abdominoplasty surgery resulting
             in a transverse hypertrophic scar of ≥ 11 cm in length

          -  Scar to be revised must have been present for >1 year

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Use of tobacco or nicotine-containing products

          -  Pregnant or lactating

          -  Post-menopausal or full hysterectomy

intervention.description: Intradermal administration on one side of revised scar and a placebo comparator on the other side.  Treatment to begin either immediately or 2 weeks following the scar revision surgery.
Intradermal administration on one side of revised scar and a placebo comparator on the other side.  Treatment to begin either immediately or 2 weeks following the scar revision surgery.

clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-Center, Prospective, Randomized, Double-Blind, Within-Subject Controlled, Phase 2a Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Safety of RXI 109 on the Outcome of Scar Revision Surgery on Transverse Hypertrophic Scars on the Lower Abdomen Resulting From Previous Surgeries in Healthy Adults

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the effectiveness of RXI-109 in reducing the recurrence of hypertrophic scar formation following elective revision of a hypertrophic abdominal scar
primary_outcome.measure: Reduction in recurrence of hypertrophic scarring after scar revision surgery

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: To assess severity and frequency of reported adverse events and clinically-relevant changes in laboratory testing after elective revision of a hypertrophic abdominal scar

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment
